text: Motu Patlu is an Indian animated television series aired on 16th October 2012 for the first time in India on the channel named Nickelodeon. The show is available in many languages like Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Marathi, Kannada, and Bengali. It is based on the old comic strip called Lotpot. The story is about two friends, Motu and Patlu, who often get into funny troubles and are saved by luck. == References == Category:Indian animated television series
title: Motu Patlu
